original_text: Then I took my staff called Favor and broke it, revoking the covenant I had made with all the nations.
korean_text: 이에 은총이라 하는 막대기를 취하여 꺾었으니 이는 모든 백성들과 세운 언약을 폐하려 하였음이라

sentences.original_text: Then I took my staff called Favor
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 내가 호칭이라 불렸던 나의 지팡이를 들었고

sentences.original_text: revoking the covenant I had made
